about.pre:
I'm a software engineer who loves to work on complex problem domains,
i'm a follower of Domain Driven Design (DDD) practices because i believe
it helps to generate a synergic workflow between project owners and developers.
about.post:
I'm convinced that having a deep domain knowledge and a good communication system helps delivering
high quality software, that's flexible to changes, and has predictable delivery times.
